"Mike has coached some great players... his guidance on how he could utilize players and how he envisions the team playing - we've been in lockstep." - McNair on Draft discussions with Mike Brown
"I'm not coming here to have fun... I'm coming here to win." - Mike Brown
"[Since the end of the Western Conference Finals] I've been heavily involved. I've talked to every single player on multiple occasions." - Mike Brown
"There has to be a set of values on the table that are led and upheld by the leaders of the organization and it starts with me." - Mike Brown
"The fan base is tremendous. I remember back in the day those damn cow bells used to ring in my ears and drive me crazy." - Mike Brown
"I'm excited about being here in Sacramento." - Kings head coach Mike Brown
"It came down to three key elements to us; experience, relationships and leadership." - Kings GM Monte McNair on Mike Brown

𝐙𝐲𝐝𝐫𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐬 𝐈𝐥𝐠𝐚𝐮𝐬𝐤𝐚𝐬

“We never lose a game because we’re not prepared. I’ve been under a lot of coaches, but when you get a good one, you know what you have… He treats everybody well. He demands a lot, but he’s fair.”

𝐃𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐲 𝐅𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐲

“From Day 1, he’s established the identity of being a defensive coach and our team being a defensive team. That’s not easy to pound away at and get through every day ... Mike sets the tone with how hard he works.” https://t.co/9NPMNLudrH

𝐃𝐫𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐨𝐧𝐝 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧

"I have no doubt in my mind that Mike is going to take his championship pedigree, his incredible -- especially defensive -- mind, incredible basketball mind with an incredible staff to Sacramento with him." https://t.co/8dfRHSIzGF

𝐊𝐥𝐚𝐲 𝐓𝐡𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐬𝐨𝐧

“He’s like a secondary head coach. Coached us throughout that time in the 2017 playoffs. Coached the Cleveland Cavaliers to the Finals. He’s been around some of the greatest to play the game." https://t.co/ADBTmaSIzJ

𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐯𝐞 𝐊𝐞𝐫𝐫

"What Mike has done for me, for this organization in his six years here, just an incredible contribution, he’s an amazing coach, amazing friend. And Sacramento made a great choice." https://t.co/6givzkjsUv

𝐃𝐚𝐧 𝐆𝐢𝐥𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐭

"Mike Brown is one of these rare people that has nearly every tool in his toolbox. He is smart, hardworking, and selfless." https://t.co/sxnKk2ogvW

𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐩𝐡𝐞𝐧 𝐉𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐬𝐨𝐧

"[Steve Kerr] and Mike Brown are those guys that they always tell me that, 'Jack, you my guy, you my guy,' so those guys I learned from and I wish I could go to war with them every day because they always have my back." https://t.co/UVfnjk1U4I

𝐋𝐞𝐁𝐫𝐨𝐧 𝐉𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐬

“Mike Brown is a great coach. He gave us success that we hadn’t had before in that city. He brought in a defensive mindset that we didn’t have… We were competitive year after year because of him and his coaching staff." https://t.co/PmKPjMz1oj
